content: Viswanathan Anand, also known as Vishy Anand, became the first Indian Grand Master in 1988, when he was 18 years old. He is the strongest non-Russian chess player since Bobby Fischer.
translations: ita:Viswanathan Anand, noto anche come Vishy Anand, Ã¨ diventato il primo Gran Maestro indiano nel 1988, quando aveva 18 anni
